details: Archmonsters will appear 200% more quickly than usual. Resources of all types will appear 100% more quickly than usual.
Farmers save 10% of their ingredients when they craft items.
Experience gained by fighting Otomai's Ark monsters is increased by 75%.
The chances of obtaining loot from Fangs of Glass monsters are increased by 75%.
The quantity of Yew Wood and Bamboo Wood harvested by lumberjacks is increased by 150%.
A special repeatable quest is available today near the Bakers' Workshop in Amakna Village. It is available to players of level 20 or higher and is not attached to the offering quest.
Bonuses gained by completing challenges are increased by 150% against Forest animals.
Experience gained in the Sandy Castle is increased by 125%.
The quality of items crafted in the city of Bonta is increased.
All varieties of Emerald Dragoturkey will give birth to one extra baby.
The chances of obtaining loot in the Dopple Training area are increased by 100%.
The quantity of Silver harvested by miners is increased by 150%.
The reward bonus on groups of monsters increases every 3 hours in the Frozen Lake area.
Experience gained in the Asparah Gorge area is increased by 100%.
Bonuses gained by completing challenges are increased by 200% in the Putrid Peat Bog area.
The chances of obtaining loot from Ghosts are increased by 75%.
An extra challenge is generated for fights against creatures in the Arachnee family.
The quantity of Pike, Eel, Perch, and Monkfish harvested by fishermen is increased by 150%.
Experience gained by fighting Kozaru is increased by 75%.
The chances of obtaining loot in the Bonta Rat Dungeon are increased by 125%.
Craftsmen save 15% of their ingredients when they craft items in the Edge of the Evil Forest area.
The reward bonus on groups of monsters increases every 3 hours in the Dark Jungle area.
The quantity of Ground Meat harvested by Hunters is increased by 125%.
The loot generated by Perceptors is increased by 300% in the Soft Oak Clearing.
Experience gained in the Primitive Cemetery area is increased by 100%.
Smiths save 10% of their ingredients when they craft items.
The quantity of Frosteez harvested by farmers is increased by 150%.
Bonuses gained by completing challenges are increased by 200% in the Amakna Castle Rat Dungeon.
The chances of obtaining loot in the Gobball Corner area are increased by 100%.
An extra challenge is generated for fights against monsters in the Dark Jungle area.
The quantity of Wild Mint Leaves harvested by alchemists is increased by 125%.
